name: Fyrewall
description:
Viruses have overrun the server rooms and you are running out of space!

CONTROLS: 

  • Use WASD keys to move 
  • Use the ‘F’ key to activate devices  
  • Spacebar to jump over Viruses
  • Alt-F4 to Quit Game

Race against the clock to survive! Can you survive against the quickly enclosing room to make it to the next level?

Collect AntiVirus FloppyDisks to fight back!

Two whole levels to test your skills on!
